text: Nadja Horwitz (born 10 March 1996) is a Chilean competitive sailor. She competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the women's 470 class. Her brother Kai Horwitz is an Olympic alpine skier for Chile."Alpine Skiing | Athlete Profile: Kai HORWITZ - Pyeongchang 2018 Olympic Winter Games" ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean female sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Chile Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Olympics – 470 Category:Jewish Chilean sportspeople
title: Nadja Horwitz
